price: 169. Il vous commande le mal et la dépravation et (vous dicte) de dire d’Allah ce que vous ne savez pas.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innamā yamurukum bil-sūi wal-faḥshāi wa-an taqūlū ʿalā al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
